backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the backend for a gaming wallet app, including user registration, profile management, game recording, deposit requests, and access control via role-based authorization and invite links.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing four frontend source files: LoginSignup, GamePlay, GameGrid, and App components, describing their key behaviors and props.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing Internet Identity authentication, actor initialization, user profile checking with a 5-second timeout guard, page routing, and user state across the app.
frontend/src/components/Banner.tsx: Auto-rotating promotional banner component cycling through three slides (welcome bonus, deposit offer, withdrawal info) every 3 seconds with slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with five tabs (Home, Activity, Refer, Support, Account) that highlights the active page and calls navigateTo on click.
frontend/src/components/GameGrid.tsx: Game grid component displaying six games split into Multiplayer and Skill & Strategy sections as cards with images, badges, player counts, and Play Now buttons that navigate to the game page.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header showing the user's avatar, VIP level, name, wallet balance with a shimmer animation, and an Add Cash button that navigates to the payment page.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper component that renders children with optional bottom padding and conditionally shows the BottomNav (hidden on payment and game pages).
frontend/src/components/LoginSignup.tsx: Multi-step login/signup component that handles Internet Identity authentication, mobile OTP verification, and new user registration with referral code support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, initializing it with the user's identity and an optional admin token from URL params.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining a dark navy/gold gaming theme with Tailwind directives, custom CSS variables, utility classes, and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Account.tsx: Account page displaying user profile, wallet balance, win/loss stats, and game history, with a logout handler that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/pages/Activity.tsx: Daily check-in page that tracks login streaks and lets users claim escalating daily bonus rewards stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/GamePlay.tsx: Renders a game play page for six mini-games (Dragon vs Tiger, 7 Up Down, Andar Bahar, Ludo, Mines, Crash) with local game logic, bet selection, and balance updates via the actor hook.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component that composes the Header, Banner, and GameGrid components along with a footer attribution link.
frontend/src/pages/Payment.tsx: Deposit/add-cash page where users select an amount, enter a 12-digit UTR number, and submit a deposit request via the actor, showing a confirmation screen on success.
frontend/src/pages/ReferEarn.tsx: Refer & Earn page that displays the user's referral code, provides copy/share actions, and explains the referral reward flow.
frontend/src/pages/Support.tsx: Support page with a contact form featuring quick-topic chips, a subject/message textarea, and a simulated submission flow with a success confirmation state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom fonts (Rajdhani, Orbitron), and an extended color palette using oklch values including gold, navy, and semantic UI colors. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document (version 13) describing a Gaming Wallet App with gold/dark-blue theme, listing existing features, known issues, and architectural notes such as UPI merchant number and â‚¹50 welcome bonus on signup.
